task_background: Prepare the artisan bakery kitchen for a high-volume production run of chocolate confections.

tasks.task_description: Place the digital_scales_1 on the overhead_ingredient_shelf_1.
Find the heaviest, silver-colored item on the stainless_steel_workbench_1 and place it in the industrial_mixing_bowl_1.
Use the wrench_1 to tighten the wobbly wire_cooling_rack_1.
